name: GroupWise Database
summary: Learn about .$ER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A $ER file is a database used by Novell GroupWise, an email and collaboration platform. It stores GroupWise's messaging system data, including email information, user data, and other communication records. $ER files are part of the internal structure of GroupWise that helps the software manage and organize emails and user interactions within the system.
